subject: Re: website changes
preview: Thanks Joel!  I also just realised that I had a case of numerical dyslexia - the order number in question was 36323 (and not 36232).  Too many 3's 😅  Kind regards,  Elise   ​http://www.totalconta

full_threads.body:
Thanks Joel!

I also just realised that I had a case of numerical dyslexia - the order number in question was 36323 (and not 36232).

Too many 3's 😅

Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

Hi Elise,

Thanks for checking,
We have now updated the bausch & lomb trigger email "Total Contacts" and this would be the "bausch & lomb"
1 product for "Total Contacts"
15 products for "bausch & lomb"

Hi again Joel,

So I found that the new order email for #36232 was sent to both Total Contacts and Bausch & Lomb for processing.

Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

Hi Joel, So what lenses are on the email trigger list for Total Contacts? The link from the email last week confirming the change has this product as being there: Here the list of Total Contact Products: https://totalcontacts.com.au/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=product&product_shipping_class=total-contacts
  • If an order comes in and one if these products exists, TOTAL Contacts - will receive an email subject (Total Contacts, URGENT: ORDER TO BE FILLED BY TC)
Am I not understanding this correctly? Kind regards, Elise ​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/ https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

Hi Elise,

I hope you are doing well.

Yes, confirming this has gone live.

Ultra One Day Sph (90) is not on the list for TotalContacts trigger email. Can you please send me all the list of Product and we will assign it total contacts email?

Good morning,

I wanted to double check that this change has gone live?

Because I've had an order come through this morning #36323 for the Ultra One Day Sph (90), but the order was emailed through to Bausch & Lomb instead of being flagged for action by Total Contacts.

Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts
(Time: 90mins)

Hi Lee,

We have updated the live site.

Here the list of Baush Lomb Products: https://totalcontacts.com.au/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=product&product_shipping_class=bausch-lomb
  • If an order comes in and one if these products exists, Bausch Lomb - will receive an email subject (BAUSCH & LOMB, you've received an order from Total Contacts - Account No. 306186, ship #8)

Here the list of Total Contact Products: https://totalcontacts.com.au/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=product&product_shipping_class=total-contacts
  • If an order comes in and one if these products exists, TOTAL Contacts - will receive an email subject (Total Contacts, URGENT: ORDER TO BE FILLED BY TC) 

Let me know if there are specific products that are needed to be in the list of Total contacts.
Awesome, yes thanks

Hi Lee and Elise,

Apologies for the delay.

We have the ready the live site and we just want to make sure that we are on the same page.

Example: If an order-12345 comes in with the following products:
Ultra One-Day (90) (with class Totalcontacts)
Ultra One Day Multifocal (90) (with class Bausch Lomb)
Ultra One Day Multifocal (30) (with class Bausch Lomb)

Supplier notification emails
TOTAL Contacts - will receive an email subject (Total Contacts, URGENT: ORDER TO BE FILLED BY TC) with product/s Ultra One-Day (90)

BL - will receive an email subject (BAUSCH & LOMB, you've received an order from Total Contacts - Account No. 306186, ship #8) with product/s Ultra One Day Multifocal (90) , Ultra One Day Multifocal (30)

Can confirm that "Ultra One-Day (90)" is the only product that needs to be associated with Totalcontacts class? if not can you send us the product links as we need to update these product

Hi Joel

Can u flick this on please?

Thanks
Lee

Hi Lee,

At the moment, no they are not coming through to me for ordering - they are going to B&L for processing.

Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

Hey Joel,
Just checking if emails are redirected now?

Thanks
Lee
No worries, are the orders flicked to us now?

Hi Lee,

Thanks for clarifying!

Sure, that setup isn’t currently in place. If you'd like us to configure it, just let us know, we’re happy to assist if you decide to move forward.

Hi Joel

Only if this is set up already. If not, and it is hours of labour, its not worthwhile and we will send the second eye manually
Lee:)

Hi Lee,

I hope you are doing well.

We just want to confirm. Would you like to go down this route?

Example: If an order-12345 comes in with the following products:
Ultra One-Day (90)
Ultra One Day Multifocal (90)
Ultra One Day Multifocal (30)

Supplier notification emails
TOTAL Contacts - will receive an email with Ultra One-Day (90)
BL - will receive an email with Ultra One Day Multifocal (90) , Ultra One Day Multifocal (30)
@joel - what are next steps here?

hi Joel
Send all orders to us, not B and L for this product, highlighted in the heading so it gets our attention

Thanks
Lee

Hi Lee,

Noted on this.

Just want to confirm, what do we need to do on Ultra 90 product?
https://totalcontacts.com.au/product/ultra-one-day-90/

Hi Joel,
Ok, lets leave it as is then without the extra changes, we will manage that manually for now. Could you make that change for ultra 90 live now and email to confirm when done?

Thanks
Lee
(Time: 30mins)

Hi Lee,

Sure, that cost would be around $700-$1000.

Is that the case with ultra 90 now?
Technically yes,

Is it only other BL products that separate emails are not triggered?
At the moment that is how the site is setup.
  • If the customer orders a product with different suppliers
    - Total 30 Multifocal (3) - ALcon
    - Ultra One-Day (90) - BL
    - Miru Monthly (6) - Menicon
    3 separate supplier notification will be triggered. For Alcon, BL, Menicon

Would you like to setup a quick meeting/call? so we finalised the details?
